Text.Page:
I don't know if it's a good idea, but due to the shortage of rations around here, folks are talking about eating {@Creature:47#1001$$Tirkai grizzly} meat.

I guess if we salted it enough it would likely eliminate any argon contamination.

Take some to Jadora at Field Base Lunacy. She has access to lots of salt.
She thinks salt will make it safe, huh? We could sure use an alternate source of food around here. I'll give it a go.
I have salt. What did you say you need it for? I don't see any meat.
